raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added three new base64-encoded secret patterns to `public-docs.yml`:

  - Hugging Face User Access Token (Base64)
  - Twilio Account SID (Base64)
- Updated SHA references in `config.json` to reflect changes
- All new entries support public/private repositories and push protection
